data.title: Top 20 celebrities who live in Hawaii in 2024: Stars who own homes in The Aloha State
data.meta_description: Celebrities who live in Hawaii prefer the island because of its unique culture and outdoor recreation. Here are some of the top celebrities living there.
data.text:
Hawaii is one of the top travel destinations in the United States, attracting millions of tourists from different parts of the world. They enjoy the clear ocean waters, sandy beaches, laid-back vibes, and breathtaking landscapes. While some people go to Hawaii for a getaway, others have made this island their home. So, who are these celebrities who live in Hawaii?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Top 20 celebrities who live in Hawaii in 2024

Celebrities who live in Hawaii right now

1. Oprah Winfrey (Keokea)

2. Clint Eastwood (Wailea)

3. Steven Tyler (Maui)

4. Owen Wilson (Quant paia)

5. Mick Fleetwood (Paia)

6. Shep Gordon (Maui)

7. Willie Nelson (Oahu)

8. Woody Harrelson (Hawaii)

9. Don Nelson (Kihei)

10. Kris Kristofferson (Hawaii)

11. Larry Ellison (Lanai Island)

12. Chuck Norris (Kauai)

13. Mark Zuckerberg (Hawaii)

14. Jeff Bezos (Hawaii)

15. Roseanne Barr (Honokaa)

16. Jack Johnson (Oahu)

17. Kelly Slater (Haleiwa)

18. Jason Momoa (Hawaii)

19. Pierce Brosnan (Kauai)

20. Matthew McConaughey (Kukio)

Who is the most famous person in Hawaii?

Where do celebrities live in Hawaii?

What celebrity owns property in Hawaii?

Why are celebrities moving to Hawaii?

Even though many famous people were born and raised in Hawaii, others have chosen to make this state their main or secondary home. Celebrities who live in Hawaii love the under-the-radar experience they get. With huge spaces to spread out, it is easy to live a quiet life without attracting much media and public attention.

Top 20 celebrities who live in Hawaii in 2024

NoNameLocation1Oprah WinfreyKeokea2Clint EastwoodWailea3Steven TylerMaui4Owen WilsonQuant paia5Mick FleetwoodPaia6Shep GordonMaui7Willie NelsonOahu8Woody HarrelsonHawaii9Don NelsonKihei10Kris KristoffersonHawaii11Larry EllisonLanai Island12Chuck NorrisKauai13Mark ZuckerbergHawaii14Jeff BezosHawaii15Roseanne BarrHonokaa16Jack JohnsonOahu17Kelly SlaterHaleiwa18Jason MomoaHawaii19Pierce BrosnanKauai20Matthew McConaugheyKukio

Celebrities who live in Hawaii right now

Hawaii is home to some of the most renowned personalities. They come in different forms, including actors, actresses, musicians, athletes, authors, and entrepreneurs. Here is a list of 15 famous people you can bump into in Hawaii:

1. Oprah Winfrey (Keokea)

Full name: Oprah Gail Winfrey

Date of birth: 29 January 1954

Age: 70 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Kosciusko, Mississippi, United States

Profession: Television producer, actress, author, and media proprietor

Net worth: $3.5 billion

Oprah Winfrey is a renowned American television producer, talk show host, author, actress, and philanthropist. She owns 60 acres of land in East Maui. In 2005, she purchased the historic Thompson Ranch in Keokea.

She transformed the ranch into a beautiful modern farmhouse. Later, Oprah bought more land in Kula, located next to her vacation home.

Her farm, located on the slope of Haleakala, grows over 100 species of organic and local fruits, herbs, and vegetables. Most of her farm produce is generously distributed to the local and neighbouring communities.

2. Clint Eastwood (Wailea)

Full name: Clinton Eastwood Jr.

Date of birth: 31 May 1930

Age: 94 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: San Francisco, California, United States

Profession: Actor

Net worth: $375 million

Clint Eastwood is an American movie actor, composer, producer and director. Clint has been in the entertainment industry for nearly seven decades, starring in hundreds of films.

He purchased a beachfront property for his family in Wailea, South Maui. In 2010, Clint Eastwood filmed his Hereafter at the property. Clint was honoured at the 3rd Annual Maui Film Festival, while his son, Scott Eastwood, was honoured at the 2000 â€“ 2022 Maui Film Festival.

3. Steven Tyler (Maui)

Full name: Steven Victor Tallarico

Date of birth: 26 March 1948

Age: 76 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: New York, United States

Profession: Singer and songwriter

Net worth: $150 million

Steven Tyles is one of the celebrities who live in Maui. He is a renowned American singer, songwriter, musician and TV personality. He is famous as the lead singer of Aerosmith, a Boston-based rock music band.

Steven bought the property in Kihei in 2012 for around $4.8 million. Even though the property sits on a quarter acre of land, it offers a great ocean view from each room.

On several occasions, he has spoken to the Maui Drug Court graduates. In addition, Steven Tyler constantly attempts to influence Maui youth positively. In 2013, the Aloha state passed the Steven Tyler Act to protect celebrities from paparazzi on their private properties.

4. Owen Wilson (Quant paia)

Full name: Owen Cunningham Wilson

Date of birth: 18 November 1968

Age: 55 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Dallas, Texas, United States

Profession: Actor

Net worth: $70 Million

Owen is another celebrity who has made Hawaii his second home. He is an American actor, producer and screenwriter from Dallas, Texas.

Compared to his fellow celebrities, the Midnight in Paris actor has a more modest bungalow at Quant Paia. Owen Wilson bought the 4,000-square-foot property in 2007 for $5.25 million.

After purchasing the home, he extensively renovated it before moving in. The eco-friendly house features five bedrooms and five and a half bathrooms. A couple of years later, Owen bought adjoining land with a small one-bedroom house for $500,000.

5. Mick Fleetwood (Paia)

Full name: Michael John Kells Fleetwood

Date of birth: 24 June 1947

Age: 77 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Redruth, United Kingdom

Profession: Musician, songwriter and actor

Net worth: $30 million

Mike Fleetwood is a British musician, songwriter, and occasional actor. He is famous for being the drummer, co-founder, and leader of the Fleetwood Mac rock band. His love for Hawaii led him to purchase a property near Napili Bay.

After retiring from his tours, the singer became a full-time resident of Maui. He has also established a few businesses in Hawaii. He owns Fleetwoodâ€™s on Front Street, a classic restaurant in Lahaina that offers good food, tasty cocktails, and live music.

For fun lovers, Mike owns Mickâ€™s House of Fleetwood, a gallery and store located at the town's entrance on Hana Highway in Paia.

6. Shep Gordon (Maui)

Full name: Shep E. Gordon

Date of birth: 18 October 1945

Age: 78 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Jackson Heights, New York, United States

Profession: American talent manager, Hollywood film agent, and producer

Net worth: $50 million

Shep Gordon is an American talent manager, producer, and Hollywood film agent. He is one of the celebrities in Maui, Hawaii. He is invested in the Maui community, serving on the board of the Maui Food Bank, which aims to offer hunger relief to the needy.

He is a full-time Maui resident and regularly dines around Wailea and Kihei, where he owns Humble Market Kitchen. Shep Gordon co-owns the spot with celebrity chef Roy Yamaguchi.

7. Willie Nelson (Oahu)

Full name: Willie Hugh Nelson

Date of birth: 29 April 1933

Age: 91 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Abbott, Texas, United States

Profession: Singer, guitarist and songwriter

Net worth: $25 million

Willie Nelson is an American singer, musician, songwriter, activist, and actor. He is one of the celebrities that live in Hawaii Oahu. Unlike other celebrities who call Hawaii their part-time home, he is a long-term resident. He has raised his entire family here and occasionally goes to the local bar.

In 1983, he purchased the 6,038-square-foot property for $450,000. After the purchase, Willie Nelson made a couple of renovations to make it more luxurious and comfortable.

The house features a recording studio, nine-hole golf course, solar-powered water system, six bedrooms, six bathrooms, and an Outdoor swimming pool. The American musician has planted various fruits, including avocados, mangoes, and papaya.

8. Woody Harrelson (Hawaii)

Full name: Woody Harrelson

Date of birth: 23 July 1961

Age: 62 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Midland, Texas, United States

Profession: Actor

Net worth: $70 million

Woody is a renowned American actor and playwright from Midland, Texas. He is one of the celebrities you can bump into in Hawaii. He transformed a huge piece of land on the north shore into a paradise retreat.

Woody bought his first piece of land in Hawaii in 1999 and has since expanded to other areas. His first house overlooks Hamoa Beach. After purchasing the land, Woody Harrelson renovated it, which was initially a cattle ranch. His second piece of land is on the slopes of the Haleakala volcano.

9. Don Nelson (Kihei)

Full name: Donald Arvid Nelson

Date of birth: 15 May 1940

Age: 84 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Muskegon, Michigan, United States

Profession: Basketball head coach

Net worth: $30 million

Don Nelson is an American former professional basketball player and head coach. He owns a mansion in Kihei, Hawaii, on a 5-acre parcel of land.

The mansion is divided into two; thus, half can be rented out. However, the duo is not aggressive about renting it out. Unlike other celebrities, Don Nelson is not a fan of water activities. Instead, he loves staring at the ocean.

10. Kris Kristofferson (Hawaii)

Full name: Kristoffer Kristofferson

Date of birth: 22 June 1936

Age: 87 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Brownsville, Texas, United States

Profession: Singer, songwriter, and actor

Net worth: $50 million

Kris Kristofferson is a former American singer, actor and songwriter. His home is set in the wilderness, offering a spacious retreat for him and his family.

The house is located at 130 Kalo Road, Hawaii, on a 10-acre property. It consists of a 3-bedroom, 4-bath main home and a 2-bedroom, 1-bath cottage that are completely separate and accessed via independent driveways.

Kris retired to his longtime home in Hana, East Maui, after touring for over five decades. Kristoffer Kristofferson and his wife, Lisa Meyers, raised his five children here.

The two are also longtime supporters of the local community. They have made generous donations to the town's secluded school system.

11. Larry Ellison (Lanai Island)

Full name: Lawrence Joseph Ellison

Date of birth: 17 August 1944

Age: 79 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: The Bronx, New York, United States

Profession: Entrepreneur

Net worth: $153 billion

Which celebrity owns a Hawaiian island? Larry Ellison is one of the celebrities owning a Hawaiian Island. He is an American business magnate and investor from the Bronx, New York. Larry Ellison bought Lanai Island for $300 million.

12. Chuck Norris (Kauai)

Full name: Carlos Ray Norris

Date of birth: 10 March 1940

Age: 84 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Ryan, Oklahoma, United States

Profession: Actor

Net worth: $70 million

Chuck Norris is one of the celebrities in Kauai you can bump into. He purchased the 4,200-square-foot mansion in 2015 for $7 million. It is located on the fourth largest island, Kauai.

Even though it is the typical Hawaiian plantation-style home, it boasts a smooth stucco instead of the traditional wood construction. Chuck Norris' house has three bedrooms and five bathrooms.

13. Mark Zuckerberg (Hawaii)

Full name: Mark Elliot Zuckerberg

Date of birth: 14 May 1984

Age: 40 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: White Plains, New York, United States

Profession: Businessman

Net worth: $172.9 billion

Mark Zuckerberg is an American businessman, internet entrepreneur and philanthropist. He is famous as the co-founder of Facebook and its parent company, Meta Platforms.

He is one of the celebrities who live on the big island of Hawaii. In 2014, Mark Zuckerberg bought 750 acres of land in pristine North Shore Kauai for $116 million and has since expanded to over 1500 acres.

Initially, the property had close to 100 homes, but since the purchase, it now comprises a Kahuaina plantation, a 357-acre organic farm, Pilaa Beach and a 393-acre property with beachfront access.

14. Jeff Bezos (Hawaii)

Full name: Jeffrey Preston Bezos

Date of birth: 12 January 1964

Age: 60 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Albuquerque, New Mexico, United States

Profession: Businessman

Net worth: $201.8 billion

Jeff is one of the celebrities you will bump into while in Hawaii. He is a globally recognised American entrepreneur, media proprietor, investor, and commercial astronaut. Jeff is also the founder, executive chairman, and former president and CEO of Amazon.

Towards the end of 2021, he bought a property from Steven Tyler at $78 million. The purchase came with access to a white sand beach in front of La Perouse Bay and a Hawaiian fish pond. Like many other celebrities, he financed his purchase by making large donations to nine non-profit organizations in Maui.

15. Roseanne Barr (Honokaa)

Full name: Roseanne Cherrie Barr

Date of birth: 3 November 1952

Age: 71 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Salt Lake City, Utah, United States

Profession: Actress, comedian, writer, and producer

Net worth: $80 million

Roseanne is an American actress, comedian, writer and producer from Salt Lake City, Utah. She has been residing in Honokaa since 2007 she purchased a 46-acre piece of land for $1.78 million. The house has three bedrooms and three-and-a-half bathrooms. In addition, it offers magical views of the surroundings.

16. Jack Johnson (Oahu)

Full name: Jack Hody Johnson

Date of birth: 18 May 1975

Age: 49 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: North Shore, Hawaii, United States

Profession: Songwriter, musician and filmmaker

Net worth: $20 million

Jack Johnson owns a charming home on the North Shore of Oahu, Hawaii. The property, located in Haleiwa, is approximately 2,000 square feet and features five bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms.

The estate includes three separate structures, with the main house containing the kitchen and bedrooms. Jack Johnson purchased this property in 2002 for $649,000.

17. Kelly Slater (Haleiwa)

Full name: Robert Kelly Slater

Date of birth: 11 February 1972

Age: 52 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Cocoa Beach, Florida, United States

Profession: Athlete

Net worth: $40 million

Kelly Slater owns a stunning beachfront property on the North Shore of Oahu, Hawaii. The estate, located on Papailoa Road in Haleiwa, has been listed for sale at $20 million.

The compound spans over 7,600 square feet and includes a main home, two guesthouses, six bedrooms, and eight bathrooms. Kelly Slater purchased this property in 2017 for $7.8 million.

18. Jason Momoa (Hawaii)

Full name: Joseph Jason Namakaeha Momoa

Date of birth: 1 August 1979

Age: 44 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Honolulu, Hawaii, United States

Profession: Actor

Net worth: $40 million

Jason's home is located on the island of Kaua'i and blends modern luxury with traditional Hawaiian elements. It incorporates local materials and emphasizes harmonious integration with the natural surroundings. Jason Momoa's house features open spaces and natural light, creating a seamless flow between the indoors and outdoors, which is characteristic of Hawaiian architecture.

19. Pierce Brosnan (Kauai)

Full name: Pierce Brendan Brosnan

Date of birth: 16 May 1953

Age: 71 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Drogheda, Ireland

Profession: Actor and film producer

Net worth: $200 million

Pierce Brosnan owns a beautiful property on the North Shore of Kauai, Hawaii. The home is situated near Tunnels Beach and not far from Hanalei Bay, offering stunning views and a serene environmentâ€‹. Pierce Brosnan has embraced the Hawaiian lifestyle, often seen engaging in activities like swimming, snorkelling, and relaxing on the beach.

20. Matthew McConaughey (Kukio)

Full name: Matthew McConaughey

Date of birth: 4 November 1969

Age: 54 years old (as of 2024)

Place of birth: Uvalde, Texas, United States

Profession: Actor

Net worth: $160 million

Matthew McConaughey owns a luxurious property in Hawaii, located in the exclusive Ka'upulehu section of the Kukio Beach and Golf Club gated community in Kailua-Kona. He purchased this chic beach property for $7.8 million in December 2020. Matthew McConaughey's home, designed by Kona architect Paul Bleck, spans over 5,300 square feet.

Who is the most famous person in Hawaii?

The most famous person associated with Hawaii is Barack Obama, the 44th President of the United States, who was born in Honolulu. Another notable figure is Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, a famous actor and wrestler with deep family ties to the islands.

Where do celebrities live in Hawaii?

Celebrities often reside in upscale areas of Hawaii, such as Maui's Wailea and Kapalua, known for their luxury resorts and stunning beaches. On Oahu, many opt for the exclusive neighbourhoods of Kailua, Lanikai, and Kahala. The Big Island also attracts celebrities to regions like Hualalai and Kukio.

What celebrity owns property in Hawaii?

Some popular celebrities who own property in Hawaii include Oprah Winfrey, Willie Nelson, Mark Zuckerberg, Matthew McConaughey and Jason Momoa.

Why are celebrities moving to Hawaii?

Celebrities are moving to Hawaii for its natural beauty, privacy, and relaxed lifestyle, offering a peaceful escape from the public eye. The islands' luxurious properties and exclusive communities provide ample security and comfort.

Celebrities who live in Hawaii chose to do so for several reasons. Apart from enjoying the beautiful paradise, they appreciate the respect for privacy accorded to them by their fans. Whether they choose to live here full-time or part-time, it's comfortable there.

Tuko.co.ke shared an article about celebrities who live in Malibu, California. Malibu is a great place that offers a sense of privacy and seclusion that is hard to find in more urban areas. The large estates and beachfront properties provide a buffer from the public eye and paparazzi.

Malibu is famous for its epic coastal hills and Mediterranean climate. The nice weather and beautiful shorelines are the primary reason people move to Malibu.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
